channel.title: MIDNIGHT - Vivrant release [Deep House]
channel.description:
Everyone has given their spin on the Sound of Vivrant pack; I figured it was my turn to put my spin on it with modern day auxy elements.
Me and my dad listen to a lot of Eric Prydz and Jeremey Olander's music and I feel like this is a pretty good combination of the two. I don't primarily post on soundcloud as much as I should, but I've been pretty active on spotify.
Let me know what you guys think of Vivrant
[MIDNIGHT - Vivrant](https://soundcloud.com/echnoolf/vivrant)

item.title: MIDNIGHT - Vivrant release [Deep House]
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
Not my genre, but nice vibe.

Kinda wish you’d created a sequence in there that made more use of the growling bass (e.g. 1:37).
That sound brought a nice alternative vibe into it. Might have been nice to explore that for a mid section.

Either way, Liked

Read full topic
